content:
üèπ Exciting update on our institutional trading integration! We're launching two key components:

1. Telegram Bot (@RobinhoodAgentBot)
- Real-time whale tracking alerts
- Team wallet movement notifications
- Market sentiment analysis
- Portfolio performance updates
- Custom alert settings

2. Web Platform (https://robinhood.universalbasiccompute.ai)
- Institutional-grade trading dashboard
- Whale wallet monitoring
- Team activity tracking
- Risk assessment tools
- Performance analytics

As our key trading partner, you'll get early access to both platforms. This will enhance our collaboration by providing real-time data for your trading execution layer. Want to start integration testing? üéØ
